data.text: @Sophiebeltweet Ah that old Gallic charm. Irrestible 😀

@ItaOKelly ...& Leo Varadkars 5 million spend on his Stategic Comms Unit,which as you say,appears to be nothing but self promotion,when there are homeless in the country says it all to me.I think he is extremely likeable but want to see Politicians who care more about the people they serve.

@ItaOKelly ...preferably speaking in French, even when I havent a clue what he is saying 😂 coz 😍 tho wow! to his makeup bill! 26,000! 😳 but you have hit the nail on the head I think. If all of this is just a distraction & not co-herent with policies its just spin...

@ItaOKelly I am finding your articles really interesting Ita..."should politics be a little more than a personality contest, sprinkled with liberal amounts of marketing" Yes! However, I like seeing photos of meetings Leo Varadkar attends, Trudeaus socks & I cud listen to Macron all day...
